attributes.action: ban the building of all mosques in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
General Synod member Alison Ruoff has called for a ban on building mosques in the UK until Muslim nations stop persecuting Christians …

The former Magistrate wants Muslim nations to stop persecuting Christians and insists that the UK should not build any more mosques until this happens

If you agree with this please sign the petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
